WorkItem.Description: I've been trying to use a DataTemplateSelector with the datagrid, but the datagrid completely ignores it and does not even call the DataTemplateSelector I assign to it. I have tested the same exact code with a ListView and it works perfectly. The issue is with the DataGrid. Are there any plans for adding support to the datagrid for DataTemplateSelectors?
WorkItem.Summary: DataGrid - ItemTemplateSelector property does nothing at all

Comments.Message: Also the DataGrid ignores the ItemTemplate property as well. But, it works fine for a ListView control.

After messing around for a while I figured out that the ItemTemplate property does work if you assign to it during an AutoGeneratingColumn event. However, I still have not gotten anything out of the ItemTemplateSelector property.
This is by design.  We can discuss alternate solutions in your other thread: http://www.codeplex.com/wpf/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=45758
